channel.title: Lower the exp
channel.description: how can i lower the exp earning by killing monsters in my server? i whant it to be near the runesape exp (some more) please help

item.title: Lower the exp
item.dc:creator: @helcast helcast
item.description:
@helcast wrote:

if the above post doesn’t work search FightType != 3

TotalExp = (double) (120 * hitDiff );
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double) (120 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double) (120 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);

This is obviously from a Dodian source… but i’ve also edited testscape with the same search
but if u can’t find keep on looking until u see something like this but only search with FightType

this may not answer your question, plus somebody already answered but this is for all the dodian fans that want there own server ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: Lower the exp
item.dc:creator: @alexplt178 alexplt178
item.description:
@alexplt178 wrote:

kk -.- if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
{
TotalExp = (double)(90 * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);

u c that 90 * hitdiff thats how much xp it gives thats just mine change that to what u want it 2 be then move to fighttype 2 3 and 4 so on =p
